vo2max.title: Add VO2Max
vo2max.subtitle: Upload a screenshot or enter the value manually

sources.title: VO2Max Sources:
sources.whoop: WHOOP doesn't share VO2Max via API — upload a screenshot from the app.
sources.apple: Apple Watch shows VO2Max, but Apple Health isn't directly integrated.

upload.label: Upload Screenshot
upload.success: Screenshot uploaded! AI is analyzing data...
upload.fallback: Screenshot uploaded, but auto-analysis is unavailable. Enter the value manually.

manual.label: VO2Max (ml/kg/min)
manual.validation: VO2Max must be between 10 and 100 ml/kg/min

inbody.minMeasurements: Upload at least 2 measurements to display progression charts
